description: Number of periodic palindromes using exactly three different symbols.
comments: For example, aaabbb is not a (finite) palindrome but it is a periodic palindrome.
references: M. R. Nester (1999). Mathematical investigations of some plant interaction designs. PhD Thesis. University of Queensland, Brisbane, Australia.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,5,-5,-6,6).
author: Marks R. Nester (nesterm(AT)dpi.qld.gov.au)
